p: The inhibitory percentage of quercetin on a different stage of SGIV infection was evaluated as described previously ( Yu et al., 2019b). Percentage inhibition = 1 − (X − B)/(A − B) × 100%. X represents each RT-qPCR results of cells treated with SGIV and quercetin on a different stage of SGIV infection, A represents the RT-qPCR result for cells treated with SGIV alone, and B represents the RT-qPCR result of normal cells.
